snippet: A crowd of 45,000, including Hollywood celebrities, gathered to watch the Gold Cup at Hollywood Park in 1939. These days, the crowds are much more sparse, and the track will run its last races on Dec. 22.
lead_paragraph: A crowd of 45,000, including Hollywood celebrities, gathered to watch the Gold Cup at Hollywood Park in 1939. These days, the crowds are much more sparse, and the track will run its last races on Dec. 22.
